greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: starting with A138174, replace left border with (1, 1, 1, ...).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 50 rows
formula: Given A128174, replace left border with (1, 1, 1, ...). Triangle read by rows, odd rows = n terms of (1, 0, 1, ...); even rows = n terms of (1, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1, ...). By columns, leftmost column = (1, 1, 1, ...); all others = (1, 0, 1, 0, 1, ...).
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Dec 01 2007
